name: SubImage
headline: See your infra from an attacker's perspective
description:
SubImage builds maps of your cloud environment to give you visibility on what assets you have and how they relate to each other. This enables any security team to deeply understand their environments and reduce risk.

SubImage is a managed offering built around the Cartography open-source project, and is founded by members of Cartography's original team.

founders.name: Alex Chantavy, Founder
founders.description: Alex has 13+ years of expertise in information security, building capabilities years ahead of what was commercially available at Lyft, Microsoft, and the NSA. He was the lead engineer on Lyft’s vulnerability management program, led penetration tests for Microsoft’s Red Team, and developed tools and techniques in support of NSA’s Computer Network Exploitation mission.

founders.name: Kunaal Sikka, Founder
founders.description: Kunaal is a former Lyft Staff Engineer and Member of Technical Staff at Anthropic. He architected critical systems such as Lyft’s SIEM, insider abuse program, and vulnerability management platform, significantly reducing security risk. His career has been marked by rapid progression—winning Microsoft’s internal employee hackathon in high school, joining Lyft at 20, and becoming a Staff Engineer within four years while reporting directly to Lyft’s CISO.

raw_markdown="SubImage
[Scenarios](https://subimage.io/<#scenarios>) [Query With Natural Language](https://subimage.io/<#query-with-natural-language-preview>) [Enrich and Customize](https://subimage.io/<#enrich-and-customize>) [Our Story](https://subimage.io/<#our-story>) [About Us](https://subimage.io/<#about-us>)
# Use an attacker's perspective to fix what matters
Built by the team behind [Cartography](https://subimage.io/<https:/github.com/cartography-cncf/cartography>) ![](https://subimage.io/assets/images/cartography-icon-color.png)
[Book a demo with the founders](https://subimage.io/<https:/cal.com/team/subimage/>)
Backed by [![Y Combinator](https://subimage.io/assets/images/ycomb-GDPK0_T4.png)](https://subimage.io/<https:/www.ycombinator.com/>)
![Handle Complexity](https://subimage.io/assets/images/handle_complexity.png)
Use your limited resources to 
address actual security risks. 
## Scenarios
### Know Exactly Who Can Access Sensitive Data 
View our [technical approach](https://subimage.io/<https:/eng.lyft.com/iam-whatever-you-say-iam-febce59d1e3b>).
### Understand Your Internet Exposure
So that you know which issues to prioritize.
### Ingest from All Vendors, Clouds, and On-Prem
Bring all your data together and connect the dots across all [supported providers](https://subimage.io/<https:/github.com/cartography-cncf/cartography/?tab=readme-ov-file#supported-platforms>).
## Query with Natural Language (preview)
Ask questions like:
  * Which S3 buckets allow public read or write access?
  * Which credentials haven't been rotated in over 90 days?
  * Which servers are running an out-of-date OS?


Just use your words.
![Chatbot Interaction](https://subimage.io/assets/images/chatbot_cropped_gif.gif)
## Enrich and Customize
Add _your_ organization's data to _your_ graph.
  * Which of your company's directors own the most security risk?
  * Who has admin access within each SaaS and Cloud platform, and who is their manager?
  * What are your company's storage buckets grouped by team?


SubImage allows you to extend the graph with your own data using a simple schema definition. Here's an example:
```
- node_label: TeamMember
 node_properties:
  - email
  - title
  - employee_id
  - id
 schema_version: 1
 relationships:
  - rel_label: MEMBER_OF_TEAM
   target_node_label: Team
   field: team_id
   target_field: id
   direction_inward: False
   rel_properties: null
 tenant_rel:
  rel_label: MANAGED_BY_ORG
  target_node_label: Organization
  field: org_id
  target_field: id
  direction_inward: True
 data_path: s3://my-bucket/team-members.json
```

## Our Story
SubImage is a fully managed offering built around the **[Cartography](https://subimage.io/<https:/github.com/cartography-cncf/cartography>)** open-source project, created at Lyft in 2019 and [donated](https://subimage.io/<https:/eng.lyft.com/cartography-joins-the-cncf-6f6b7be099a7>) to The Linux Foundation in 2024. Founded by members of the original Cartography team, SubImage helps organizations focus limited resources on the risks that matter by mapping attack paths and weak points leading to sensitive data in the same way an attacker would.
## About us
### Alex Chantavy // Co-founder & CEO
![alex](https://subimage.io/assets/images/alex.png)
  * Co-creator of Cartography
  * 13+ year infosec career, building capabilities years ahead of what was commercially available at Lyft, Microsoft, and the NSA
  * Architected and built Lyft's [vulnerability management](https://subimage.io/<https:/eng.lyft.com/vulnerability-management-at-lyft-enforcing-the-cascade-part-1-234d1561b994>) [platform](https://subimage.io/<https:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=F4EFHK21Et0>), led penetration tests for Microsoft's Red Team, developed tools and techniques for NSA's Computer Network Exploitation mission


[![Alex Chantavy's LinkedIn](https://subimage.io/assets/images/linkedin-brands-solid.svg)](https://subimage.io/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/alexchantavy/>) [![Alex Chantavy's Twitter](https://subimage.io/assets/images/square-twitter-brands-solid.svg)](https://subimage.io/<https:/twitter.com/alexchantavy>)
### Kunaal Sikka // Co-founder & President
![kunaal](https://subimage.io/assets/images/kunaal.png)
  * Former Lyft Staff Engineer and Member of Technical Staff at Anthropic
  * Architected Lyft's next-generation SIEM, insider abuse program, and vulnerability management platform, reducing security risks and driving cross-organizational change
  * Won Microsoft's internal employee hackathon as a [high school intern](https://subimage.io/<https:/www.linkedin.com/posts/kunaals_had-the-amazing-opportunity-to-meet-some-activity-6357444047820455936-UDlO?utm_source=share&utm_medium=member_desktop>), delivering protoype for what became [LinkedIn's QR feature](https://subimage.io/<https:/www.inc.com/tom-popomaronis/linkedin-subtly-released-a-new-networking-feature-it-just-may-kill-business-card.html>)


[![LinkedIn](https://subimage.io/assets/images/linkedin-brands-solid.svg)](https://subimage.io/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/kunaals/>) [![Twitter](https://subimage.io/assets/images/square-twitter-brands-solid.svg)](https://subimage.io/<https:/twitter.com/kunaalsikka>)
## Get Started
Do you think in graphs?
[Book a demo with the founders](https://subimage.io/<https:/cal.com/team/subimage/>)

generated_description:
### SubImage: Navigating Cloud Security through Visual Mapping

Founded in 2024 and nestled in the heart of San Francisco, SubImage emerged from the foundations of the Cartography open-source project, which originated at Lyft. The company is run by a tight-knit team of two, including co-founders Alex Chantavy and Kunaal Sikka, both of whom have impressive backgrounds in cybersecurity.

SubImage's mission is straightforward but critical: to help organizations “see your infra from an attacker's perspective.” In today’s complex digital landscape, understanding your cloud environment is not just a technical requirement but a crucial strategy for minimizing risk. Their software builds detailed visual maps of cloud assets, showing how everything connects and where vulnerabilities lie—similar to how an attacker would assess your environment.

#### Why It Matters
Imagine operating your business without knowing your digital assets' potential weak points. SubImage tackles this directly, enabling security teams to prioritize efforts based on real risk, not just theoretical threats. They empower organizations to see who accesses sensitive data, understand internet exposure, and integrate data from various vendors. 

With features like natural language querying, they allow users to ask straightforward questions—think, “Which S3 buckets allow public read access?”—and get instant clarity on potential security lapses.

#### The Team Behind the Vision
Chantavy and Sikka are no strangers to the high-stakes world of information security. Their combined experience includes significant roles at Lyft, Microsoft, and the NSA. They know firsthand the vulnerabilities that can emerge in cloud environments, and with their expertise in building advanced security systems, they’re keen on making those systems accessible to more organizations.

#### The Bigger Picture
SubImage is part of Y Combinator's Batch W25, a prestigious accelerator that has birthed numerous successful startups. Their approach not only emphasizes proactive risk management but also invites companies to enrich their security maps with proprietary data. This capability sets them apart, enabling organizations to truly tailor defenses according to their unique contexts and challenges.

SubImage is at the intersection of artificial intelligence, security, and open source, making complex security analyses intuitive and effective. If you’re wrestling with your security posture in a cloud-dominated era, their offering could represent a vital step forward.

You can explore more about their services or request a demo on their [website](https://subimage.io). It’s worth a closer look, especially if you’re serious about fortifying your defenses against the ever-evolving threat landscape.
